plot: Hinata is inspired by the Small Giant playing volleyball on TV. Three years later, he goes to his first-ever volleyball tournament with his team and is set to play against the school of Kageyama Tobio, also known as the King of the Court.

Hinata has been intrigued by volleyball ever since seeing the Small Giant playing. After struggling to find a team, he finally get's to go to a tournament three years later for the first time. There they play against Kitagawa Daiichi, a powerhouse middle school, and Kageyama Tobio who is infamously known as the King of the Court. Their match sparks a interesting rivalry between the two. However, a year later, when Hinata joins a high school volleyball team, he finds a new unexpected team mate there.—KAB
